channel.title: Release Shamon Scape?
channel.description:
[center][b][size=15pt]Post Your Thoughs or i might not consider releasing[/size][/b]
should i release my server ive released it once or twice before but removed it?
client.java is 775kb and its class is 281kb (using the convention tool) there is very little lag and a very good ban method theres lots of skills
mining gem crafting fletching smithing wood cutting magic mele range fire making herbolore cooking
i think thats it? good pking this is not a czar or a dodian source it is a long and forgoten source called realm of darkness its not to laggy and has had alot of work on it its the very first source i downloaded and the only ive stuck to its been edited well over 7 months
anyways ill post some pictures of it just a few
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/theif.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/woods.png[/img]
magic [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/train4.png[/img]
strength [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/train3.png[/img]
defence [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/train2.png[/img]
attack [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/train1.png[/img]
shops [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/shops.png[/img]
part of crabs [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/crabs.png[/img]
part of barrows [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/barrows.png[/img]
really small part of abbys [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/abbys.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/cooking.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/fletchscreen.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/mining.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb242/openice123/wc.png[/img]
[/center]

item.title: Release Shamon Scape?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“Elux, post:4, topic:197419”]I dont really like it the command shit in the emotes tab, thats the worst thing you could ever add to a server.
looks so ugly and annoying lol.
apart from that its fine[/quote]
eh makes it easy to navagate and thanks im adding more pics cus im bored
